content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-14.5, -48.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0), extracting iron ore and dropping it into a wooden chest at position (-14.5, -48.5).
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5), storing extracted iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0), smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0), smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Stone Furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0), currently not smelting due to lack of ingredients.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5), waiting for source items to transfer.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -45.5), waiting for source items to transfer.
- Iron Chest at position (-14.5, -47.5), currently empty.

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (41.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0), extracting coal and dropping it into an iron chest at position (41.5, -80.5).
- Iron Chest at position (41.5, -80.5), storing extracted coal.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0), smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5), waiting for source items to transfer.
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5), currently empty.

## ERROR TIPS

### Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Ensure that the inserters have access to source items. Check if the connected chests or furnaces have items available for transfer.

### Full Output in Furnaces
- Regularly check and clear the output of furnaces to prevent them from becoming full and halting production.

### Chest at Drop Position Full
- Regularly empty chests at drop positions to ensure continuous operation of mining drills and inserters.

### No Ingredients to Smelt in Furnaces
- Ensure that furnaces have a continuous supply of raw materials to prevent idle time.
